title: Onam Festival Story
text: Onam is a celebration that brings people together, reminding us of harmony, prosperity, and cultural pride. The vibrant colors, traditional games, and joyful spirit reflect timeless values of our heritage.
name: Robert Fox

title: Great Experience
text: Super smooth process with incredible results. Highly recommend!
name: Jenny Wilson

title: Great Experience

name: Jenny Wilson

title: Great Experience
text: Armadam 2024, proudly hosted by the 2021–2024 batch, was more than just the first grand Onam celebration — it was the most remarkable program ever conducted in the history of Sri Shanmugha College. The event brought together vibrant pookalam designs, the graceful beauty of Thiruvathira dance, energetic cultural performances, thrilling games, and the sweet delight of payasam, creating an atmosphere of pure joy and celebration. What set Armadam apart was the unity it inspired — every student’s active involvement and the wholehearted support of the management turned this vision into an unforgettable reality. Armadam 2024 will be remembered as the benchmark for all future events in our college.
name: Fadal
